metadata.lecture_topic: В Nesterov, вычисли ∇ в ω - γ v_{t-1}: γ=0.9, v=1, ∇=2.

turns.content: В Nesterov, вычисли ∇ в ω - γ v_{t-1}: γ=0.9, v=1, ∇=2.

turns.model_response:
In the Nesterov momentum method, you compute the gradient with respect to ω as follows: ∇L(ω - γv_{t-1}). Given your parameters γ=0.9, v=1, and ∇=2, we can substitute them into the formula:

∇L(ω - γv_{t-1}) = ∇L((ω - γ * 1) ) = ∇L(ω - γ)

So the gradient with respect to ω in the Nesterov momentum method is 2 - γ, or 2 - 0.9 = 1.1 in your case.
